constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Tolworth Key Area of Change

description: Erection of single storey rear extension and rear dormer roof extension with installation of 1no front rooflight to facilitate loft conversion. Alterations to the soil and vent pipe
decision_conditions: The erection of single storey rear extension and rear dormer roof extension with installation of 1no front rooflight to facilitate loft conversion and alterations to the soil and vent pipe falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes A, B, C and G of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that Planning Condition 24 (Drainage) of planning permission 18/10212/FUL is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

Please submit a copy of an Ordnance Survey based site location plan scaled 1:1250 with the application site outlined in red and adjoining land owned by applicant in blue, showing at least two road frontages and a North point.The submitted location plan does not have a name of the road and it is not labelled.
